text: John Fitzalan was a Lord of Clun and Oswestry in the Welsh Marches. He was born in 1200 and died in 1240.Cokayne, G. E., edited by Vicary Gibbs & H. A. Doubleday, The Complete Peerage, London, 1926, vol.v., p. 392 == References == Category:1200 births Category:1240 deaths
title: John Fitzalan
